pymodaq-plugins.description:
Plugins initially developed with PyMoDAQ
Includes Mock plugins that are plugins of virtual instruments dedicated to code testing a new functionalities development.

Actuator: Mock actuator to test PyMoDAQ functionnalities
TCP server to communicate with other DAQ_Move or third party applications
Viewer0D: Mock detector to test PyMoDAQ functionnalities
Mock detector to test PyMoDAQ adaptive scan mode
TCP server to communicate with other DAQ_Viewer or third party applications
Viewer1D: Mock detector to test PyMoDAQ functionnalities
Mock detector to test pymodaq_spectro functionalities
TCP server to communicate with other DAQ_Viewer or third party applications
Viewer2D: Mock detector to test PyMoDAQ functionnalities
TCP server to communicate with other DAQ_Viewer or third party applications
ViewerND: Mock actuator to test PyMoDAQ functionnalities

pymodaq-plugins.description: Plugin devoted to the National Instrument signal acquisition and generation using the NiDAQmx library. Includes an actuator plugin for signal generation, a 1D viewer plugin for data acquisition as a function of time and a 0D viewer plugin for quick time averaging acquisition

PyMoDAQ Orsay STEM and Camera plugin
Can be used to control Ropers or Princeton Cameras
Can be used to control STEM (Scanning Tunnel Electron Microscope) using the HOUDs 2 hardware module to drive coils within a STEM

From Marcel Tence source code from LPS Laboratory at Orsay University, France

Actuator: X and Y electron beam displacement in a STEM
Viewer2D: Cameras from Ropers and Princeton Instruments

pymodaq-plugins.description: Set of PyMoDAQ plugins for instruments from Newport (Conex, ESP100,...)

Actuator: Piezo actuators from the CONEX-AGAP series

pymodaq-plugins.description: Set of PyMoDAQ plugins for instruments from Thorlabs (Kinesis K10CR1 (stepper rotation actuator), Kinesis Flipper, Kinesis KSP100...)

Actuator: Kinesis serie (tested on K10CR1 and Flipper)

pymodaq-plugins.description: Set of PyMoDAQ plugins for Actuators from Physik Instumente (All the ones compatible with the GCS2 commands as well as the old 32bits MMC controller...)

Actuator: All stages compatible with the GCS2 library
Old Stages using the 32 bits MMC dll

pymodaq-plugins.description: Set of PyMoDAQ plugins for Actuators from Piezoconcept (Tested on the Bio200 XY stage. Include a version of the controller firmware emulating functions from PhysikInstrumente)

Actuator: PiezoConcept stages (tested on BIO2.100) both using the usual serial commands and the ones derived from PI command set

pymodaq-plugins.description: Set of PyMoDAQ plugins for Actuators from Smaract (MCS_controller, ...)

Actuator: Actuators driven using the MCS controller and its library

pymodaq-plugins.description: Set of PyMoDAQ plugins for Andor Camera (CCD camera using SDK2, SCMOS cameras using SDK3...)

Viewer1D: Shamrock series of spectrometer using the Andor CCD cameras
Viewer2D: Andor CCD camera using the SDK2

pymodaq-plugins.description: Set of PyMoDAQ plugins for Picoquant instruments (TimeHarp260, ...)

Viewer1D: Timeharp TH260 for photon counting and time tagging

pymodaq-plugins.description: Set of PyMoDAQ plugins for Horiba Instruments (Lapspec6TCP to communicate with labspec softaware using the AFM TCP/IP protocol)

Viewer1D: Control of Labspec6 settings and acquisition using TCP/IP communication

pymodaq-plugins.description: Set of PyMoDAQ plugins for Fluorescence Lifetime Imaging Microscopy

ViewerND: FLIM using piezoconcept XY stage and picoquant timeharp TH260

pymodaq-plugins.description: Set of PyMoDAQ plugins for various physical measurements: multimeter, lockin, oscilloscope, indus cameras...

Viewer2D: Webcams control using the opencv library

pymodaq-plugins.description: Set of PyMoDAQ plugins for Holoeye Spatial Light Modulator (SLM)

Actuator: Let you apply various phase accross the SLM (tested with the LC2012)

pymodaq-plugins.description: This repository contains a set of PyMoDAQ plugins for Amplitude Systems Lasers

Viewer0D: Let you control the laser settings and grab info on the laser status (tested on a Satsuma)

pymodaq-plugins.description: Set of PyMoDAQ plugins for OceanInsight (OceanOptics) spectrometers

Viewer1D: Control of Spectrometer using the Omnidriver library (should be installed)
